name: Failed Logon Attempt
suggested_treatment: Investigate the source IP and username; consider locking the account or blocking IP

name: Successful Logon with Admin Privileges
suggested_treatment: Verify if admin logon is authorized

name: Account Locked Out
suggested_treatment: Check if account lockout is expected or due to malicious activity

name: User Account Created
suggested_treatment: Verify if the new account creation is authorized

name: User Account Deleted
suggested_treatment: Check if account deletion is authorized

name: Group Membership Added
suggested_treatment: Verify changes in group membership are authorized

name: Group Membership Removed
suggested_treatment: Ensure removal from group is authorized

name: User Right Assigned
suggested_treatment: Verify user rights assignment is valid

name: User Right Removed
suggested_treatment: Check removal of user rights for authorization

name: Object Access Attempt Failed
suggested_treatment: Check failed file access and permissions

name: Object Access Attempt Succeeded
suggested_treatment: Monitor access for sensitive files

name: Audit Policy Change
suggested_treatment: Verify audit policy changes are authorized

name: Security System Shutdown
suggested_treatment: Investigate unexpected shutdowns

name: Log Cleared
suggested_treatment: Investigate clearing of security logs

name: Service Installed
suggested_treatment: Verify if service installation is authorized

name: Service Deleted
suggested_treatment: Verify if service deletion is authorized

name: Privilege Use Attempted
suggested_treatment: Check if privilege use is legitimate

name: Special Privilege Assigned to Account
suggested_treatment: Investigate assignment of special privileges

name: Logon Session Created
suggested_treatment: Track login sessions for auditing

name: Logon Session Terminated
suggested_treatment: Monitor logoff events for unusual patterns

name: Account Password Changed
suggested_treatment: Verify password changes are authorized

name: Account Password Reset
suggested_treatment: Check password resets for authorization

name: Process Created
suggested_treatment: Monitor suspicious process creation

name: Process Terminated
suggested_treatment: Check unexpected process terminations

name: Privilege Escalation Attempt
suggested_treatment: Investigate privilege escalation attempts

name: File Permission Changed
suggested_treatment: Verify file permission changes

name: Object Ownership Changed
suggested_treatment: Check changes in file ownership

name: Security Group Created
suggested_treatment: Verify creation of security groups

name: Security Group Deleted
suggested_treatment: Verify deletion of security groups

name: Directory Service Changes
suggested_treatment: Check unauthorized directory service modifications

name: Directory Service Object Created
suggested_treatment: Verify creation of directory service objects

name: Directory Service Object Deleted
suggested_treatment: Verify deletion of directory service objects

name: Directory Service Object Modified
suggested_treatment: Verify modifications of directory service objects

name: Credential Manager Access
suggested_treatment: Check if credential use is authorized

name: IPSec Policy Change
suggested_treatment: Verify IPSec policy changes are authorized

name: Network Policy Change
suggested_treatment: Check if network policy changes are authorized

name: Registry Key Added
suggested_treatment: Verify registry changes

name: Registry Key Deleted
suggested_treatment: Verify registry deletion is authorized

name: Security Policy Changed
suggested_treatment: Check security policy changes

name: Logon Attempt Outside Business Hours
suggested_treatment: Investigate unusual logon times
